title: Can we get an option to put the KDA back on the map please?
body: Cause there is no reason to spread information out nonsensically like this.  If people really hate change so much that they don't want their information condensed into one easy location, that's fine, but can you at least give us the option to use the more logical layout if we want?

replies.body: I agree. I got used to having my K/D/A, CS, and what-not right above the map and it actually helped me with my map awareness. Being a new player, it was really helpful.
